name: Strawberry Cheesecake Popsicles®
author: Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
summary: Creamy (non-dairy) strawberry frozen pops with a pretzel crumb base make a refreshing snack.
ingredients: ⅜ cup Snack Factory® Gluten Free Original Pretzel Crisps® Minis
⅛ cup plain coconut milk yogurt
3 tablespoons almond (or soy or coconut) milk
directions: In a food processor, pulse Gluten Free Original Pretzel Crisps® Minis to a fine crumb consistency
Mix in a bowl with vegetable oil and set aside
Place strawberries, cream cheese, confectioners' sugar, yogurt, and almond milk into a food processor
Mix on low until strawberries are broken down and ingredients are combined and creamy
Pour strawberry mixture into a Popsicle® mold or any silicone mold
Carefully press Pretzel Crisp® crumbs on top to cover
Stick a Popsicle® stick or decorative straw into each mold and freeze until hard
